dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Hey Sam, how's your assignment going? I'm completing my homework for Professor Garcia's class right now.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Not great, to be honest. I'm working on that presentation about a mountain pass in winter. It's for tomorrow's meeting with the research team.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Oh, the one for the geography program? That sounds complicated.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: It is! I have to explain how temperature and weather change at high altitude. The problem is, I can't organise my ideas easily.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Do you want some help? I finished my report yesterday, so I have time now.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Really? That would be perfect! I'm glad you're here. Let me switch on my computer and I'll show you what I have so far.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Okay, let's see your document. Wait... Sam, this section about the winter season is going in the wrong direction. You're talking about spring flowers on a mountain!

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: What? No, that can't be right. Oh no... I think I copied the wrong text from my notes. This is terribly mixed up!

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Don't rush. We still have time to fix this. What's the main theme you want to present?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: The team wants me to describe how a mountain pass exists in different seasons, but with detail about winter conditions.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Good. So let's complete this step by step. First, switch this paragraph with that one about temperature.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: You're right. And I owe you for this! I was so worried I would fail the presentation completely.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: It's not your fault. These intensive university programs are difficult for all of us.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: There! I think that's done. The explanation about clouds and snow is now in the right position.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Let me review it quickly. Yes, this looks impressive now! The description of the pass is clear and detailed.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Do you think the team will be happy with it?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Definitely. That completes our meeting for today, I'd say! You're ready for tomorrow.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: I can't thank you enough. Next time you need help with Spanish class, just let me know.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Deal! Now, let's take a break. All this work made me hungry.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Good idea. And tomorrow, I won't be nervous about the presentation. Thanks to you, my friend!
